main event: A bright, round object, larger than a conventional aircraft, was observed hovering and moving silently at a rapid rate of speed over Machias, Maine on September 16, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes.
It appeared to hover and then move silently in a horizontal direction at a rapid rate of speed.
No sound was heard from the object.
The object was observed by several persons independently and reported to the Machias police department.
The object disappeared from view after approximately 15 minutes of observation.
sighted object: a bright, round object, larger than a conventional aircraft
photographs: no photographs included in the report
